https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j7HiucCbyLKHW8S7hnl1kOJrThM.jpg Residents of the community around Grenfell Tower tell an extraordinary story, 150 years in the making, of how their borough became the most unequal place in Britain. Before Grenfell: A Hidden History
